document_data.mainbody:
windling Greene was the daughter of Dholber Greene and one of the guests of Nortales Hostel in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Like her father, Dwindling was a human with dark skin. She also shared his brown eyes and had straight brown hair.
In the , as the Absolute crisis ravaged the Western Heartlands, the city of Baldurs Gate became flooded with refugees. Dholber Greene was lucky enough to secure lodgings for himself and Dwindling at Nortales Hostel that offered beds to the refugees. Dwindling and her father lost family members, who did not make it to the Gate. At the hostel, the girl complained about lice and funny-smelling soap.
